journals.notes:
I did a remarkable findings again! These two bad boys, I mean the commands are more bugged than I could have imagined.
Here are things I found:

I'm going to split all the classes into different sections:

1. Soldier
- -When using MG or Mortar and you do \weapprevinbank (it makes some sort of sound when used many times in a row), after that you can't use \weapalt (MOUSE2) to mount the gun until you do \weapnextinbank-
- -Allied Bazooka makes sound when using \weapnextinbank many times in a row-

2. Covert Ops
- -When using Sniper/FG42 and doing \weapprevinbank you can't \weapalt to zoom until you do \weapnextinbank-
*-With FG42 it makes some sort of sound when spamming \weapprveinbank-
- -When equiping Satchel Charge, doing \weapprevinbank will take out the remote control for one second-

3. All Classes
- -When doing \weapnextinbank while using Colt/Luger, it will make the sound that it would put the silencer on-

-*S

-4. Engineer-
- -When you are out of rifle grenades in your M1 Garand/K43 and you do \weapprevinbank, it will do the animation that it would mount the rifle grenade.-

-*S

So far I have tried to reproduce other issues but it seems that there's only left to fix the silenced pistol and its issues. Sounds don't get spammed anymore. I will add some addition information what's left to fix.

-*S

Almost everything seems to be fine except a couple of issues with silenced pistol and rifles. See the related tickets.

-*S

details.name: description
details.old_value:
There are these tiny issues with these commands:

1. Covert op with single silenced colt:
- You can do \weapnextinbank which takes away the silencer
- You can't do \weapprevinbank in any case
- After taking away silencer and doing \weapnextinbank makes the sound but doesn't do anything else and can also be spammed

2. Engineer with garand:
- You can do \weapprevinbank to put on the riflegrenade but not \weapnextinbank to do it
- You can do \weapnextinbank to take away the riflegrenade but no \weapprevinbank
- When having riflegrenade you can use \weapprevinbank to spam the sound but it doesn't do anything else
- When not having the riflegrenade you can use \weapnextinbank to spam the sound but it doesn't do anything else

-*S
